message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $13,000. I believe this is a fair offer considering its worth to you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, however, the value of this product is quite high. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $12,000?
